name: Alexander Nizovoy
about:
Hello, my name is Alexander, but usually I subscribe Alex. I'm years old, I work for a small company, which is engaged in metal structures. It is our company's web site. Because the company is small, I work as a turner, welder, crane operator etc.

But nearly one year, I became interested in the sphere of Javascript. The last six months my interest became more insistent, I began to view online lessons, sign up for free courses.
